title: Battered US Champion Quinn Endures Crash Lowpoint in ‘Weird’ Tour de France
content:
EF Education-EasyPost's breakaway-seeking American duo race on wounded as Neilson Powless suffers wrist fracture.

Read the full article at Battered US Champion Quinn Endures Crash Lowpoint in ‘Weird’ Tour de France on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
